title: Game Mechanics: Foley Pack1
description: High-quality foleys of mechanical, hardware, metallic objects, and electrical tools
longDescription:
Listen to the watermarked demo of some of the sounds:

CLICK HERE

Unlock the immersive world of game mechanics with our foley sound effects pack. From clicking gears to creaking doors, we have created a symphony of mechanical, hardware, and electrical sounds. Available in three high-quality specs (96kHz/24bit, 48kHz/24bit, 44.1kHz/24bit), it’s the ultimate toolkit for enhancing realism and depth in your game audio.

“This pack is our first release in a series of 10 packs on which our team has been working for the last few weeks to create and design these sounds.”


(Tools shown in the artwork are symbolic. Provided sounds are as per the list mentioned in technical details)
technicalDetails:

(599 sounds in each audio spec)

  • Mechanical_Rotating_Wheel_Clattering
